//: NETStandard.Library: 1.0.0-rc3-23811, it is required in every project. Without it dotnet restore fails. 'but there is no run-time assembly compatible with win7-x64.' All the other libraries reference this as runtime.
in the framework section: 'dnxcore50' or dotnet50 or dotnet55 should be before the dnx451,net451, because 'dotnet run' will execute the first framework that it finds

2016-05-19: after upgrading from Dotnet RC1 to RC2: on Linux the official RC2 release = version RC2-24027 works, but version RC3-24103 has System.Net.Http Problem. (Test with Overmind.TestServer) Windows OK. Only on Linux. Sticking to 24027 now.
